items.sentence: I think we\'re all aware of the consequences.
I think we\'re going to stay for another day.
I think you haven\'t understood the question.
I think you know Tom isn\'t going to do that.
Tom and Mary don\'t have a good relationship.
Tom and Mary don\'t want to do that together.
Tom will miss the train if he doesn\'t hurry.
Tom inherited a considerable amount of money.
Tom is by far the best student in this class.
Tom is going to be teaching French next year.
Tom is looking forward to his birthday party.
I\'m getting used to working the night shift.
I\'m going to take Tom back to his apartment.
I\'m not going to tell Tom what he should do.
Tom told his friends that he never eats meat.
Tom told me a really funny joke this morning.
Tom told me that he knew how to speak French.
Tom has just been told that he\'s been fired.
Tom certainly isn\'t qualified to do the job.
Tom certainly seems to enjoy Mary\'s company.
